function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive review of the COVID-19 outbreak and its potential implications","Impact":"Limited understanding of the current global situation due to the COVID-19 pandemic","Mitigation":"Conducting a detailed survey that provides both the horizontal and vertical view of the COVID-19","Technologies":"Data analytics, AI, IoT for comprehensive data collection and analysis","People":"Global population, public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Researchers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"No work in the existing literature reviewing the role of emerging technologies in managing the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Potential missed opportunities for leveraging new technologies to alleviate the impact of the pandemic","Mitigation":"Conducting a thorough analysis of the role of IoT, UAVs, AI, blockchain, and 5G in managing the COVID-19 pandemic","Technologies":"IoT, UAVs, AI, blockchain, 5G for disease management and prevention","People":"Public health officials, organizations, technology developers","Owner":"Technology developers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Historical pandemics and their impact on humankind","Impact":"Understanding the severity of past pandemics and learning from historical experiences to better manage current pandemics","Mitigation":"Incorporating historical pandemic data into current pandemic management strategies","Technologies":"Data analytics, historical data mining, AI for pattern recognition","People":"Global population, public health officials, historians, researchers","Owner":"Researchers, public health organizations, historians"}]}
